name: Fight Class (ALPHA)
description:
Fight Class was our final project for Video Game Design 2 class at Webster University. We designed and developed it during the last 6 weeks of the semester. Our goal was to make a minimal version of a Sega Genesis - Mortal Kombat inspired fighting game where the students are the fighters. Almost all the art and UI are photographs and hand sketches. It was quite a blast for us to make! Darn proud of this team! 

Note: Playing in browser doesn't support video, so be sure to check out the YouTube 👇 to watch the incredible Intro Cinematic!

Also, expect a more functional update by the beginning of 2021 :D.

Player 1 Controls:

  • Navigate Screen: W,A,S,D, Enter
  • Move Left/Right: A / D
  • Jump: W
  • Block: S
  • Punch: F
  • Kick: G 

Player 2 Controls:

  • Navigate Screen: Arrow Keys, Enter
  • Move Left/Right: Left / Right Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Up Arrow Key
  • Block: Down Arrow Key
  • Punch: Number Pad 1
  • Kick: Number Pad 2
